## Source: amazon-inspector (44b8f1c01b0b1d801421e87d707f28e16c71d39649a5cb21cda5ca7051044f2a)
The package karemm5 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c93324c96aff01b5bb7f276d1e990c3dc9839738802cc0a7f7cd42103950ec54)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karemm5' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
